dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 3751 IH: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the rule providing parity for exclusion from income for employer-provided mass transit and parking benefits.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Norton introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the rule providing parity for exclusion from income for employer-provided mass transit and parking benefits.

section.header: Extension of parity for exclusion from income for employer-provided mass transit and parking benefits

subsection.text: Paragraph (2) of section 132(f) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by striking January 1, 2014 and inserting January 1, 2015.
The amendment made by this section shall apply to months after December 31, 2013.
